text:
"PROMISING PRACTICES" - FILM 4
PAGE 34
VIDEO
AUDIO
128. NARRATOR POINTS TO OLD
BUILDING AND NEW BUILDING
#1 AND PEERS IN.
NARRATOR: (SYNC) If we should look
inside these schools again. . . we might
find some promising practices beginning
to emerge here, too.
129. NARRATOR.
NARRATOR: (SYNC) Yes. Adaptability
is an important. . . actually, a VITAL human
quality.
NARRATOR PICKS UP MODEL
OF TYRANNOSAURUS REX.
130. CU. TYRANNOSAURUS REX.
FULL SCREEN
NARRATOR: (SYNC) It enables me to
stand here and show you the model of an
extinct dinosaur. . .
131. NARRATOR ON SCREEN -
HOLDING DINOSAUR MODEL.
NARRATOR: (QUIZZICALLY) Rather
than letting HIM stand here and show you
a picture of extinct ME!
FADE DOWN ON NARRATOR
FADE UP ON
132. MODEL OF NEW SCHOOL #2
RUN CLOSING TITLES AND CREDITS
OVER MODEL OF NEW SCHOOL #2.
